title: What Does EA Play Mean For Xbox Game Pass? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.29.20
description:
Blessing and Imran talk about EA Play joining Game Pass at Xbox Series X launch, Yakuza Like a Dragon save data being weird, and more.

00:00:00 - Start
00:04:46 - Housekeeping
It’s Tuesday, and you know what that means: a new episode PS I Love You XOXO is live! This week, me and Greg predict the metacritic scores for the PS5 launch line-up. Come post yours in the YouTube Comments!
Donktober begins this Saturday. Me and Barrett are playing through the entirety of DK64. You can catch that live, every Saturday this month starting at noon pacific time and then later on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Tom Bock, Mohammed Mohammed, & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:07:37 - EA Play on Game Pass is launching with Xbox Series X - Tom Warren @ The Verge
00:22:30 - Is the Yakuza series now becoming more of an Xbox series? - Will Ramos
00:30:03 - Speaking of EA: The still-unannounced Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit remaster has been rated - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:35:00 - Details on the Pokemon Sword & Shield: Crown Tundra DLC - JoeSkrebels @ IGN
00:42:33 -  Upstart 
00:43:30 -  HIMS
00:45:15 -  Logitech 
00:48:50 - Epic V Apple Update: Judge calls for Trial by Jury - James Batchelor @ GiBiz
00:56:58 - Out today
00:59:25 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Whitta
